song.englishname: For You I'll Be Forgetting Me

english.segment1: Decorations fell, A red and green wives tale. A silver line surrounds. Rooftops and black clouds. Are on their way to me.
english.segment2: Happy Birthday to me. The forgotten King
english.segment3: Open hand outstretched. To receive their prize. But I could give you anything, Yes anything. You're everything to me.
